app.subtitle: Performance · Disk Cleanup · System Security · Gaming
card.custom.title: CHOOSE WHAT I WANT TO CLEAN
card.custom.body: Check exactly what you want to remove. Each option is explained with what it touches and what it doesn't. Full control guaranteed.
card.quick.title: Quick Clean
card.quick.s1.label: What is cleaned:
card.quick.s1.items:
Temporary Windows files (%TEMP%, C:\Windows\Temp)
Browser caches (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave)
Windows thumbnails
Prefetch (recreated on next startup)
Recycle bins on all drives
Windows logs (system logs)
card.quick.never.label: NEVER touches:
card.quick.never.items: saves, game files, installed apps, documents
card.gaming.title: Gaming + Disk Optimization
card.gaming.s1.label: What is cleaned:
card.gaming.s1.items:
Steam shader cache (recreated, only slows down 1st run)
Steam, Epic Games, Battle.net logs and dumps
DirectX / GPU shader cache (D3DSCache)
Discord, Spotify, OBS cache (logs only)
card.gaming.s2.label: Disk optimization:
card.gaming.s2.items:
HDD: intelligent sector defragmentation
SSD: TRIM (frees unused blocks)
Disk error check (chkdsk /scan)
card.gaming.never.label: NEVER touches:
card.deep.title: Deep Clean
card.deep.s1.label: Everything from Quick Clean +
card.deep.s1.items:
Developer caches (npm, pip, gradle, NuGet)
Deep browser cleaning
Windows Update cache (old files)
Defragmentation + Windows component cleanup
Restore point created automatically before
card.deep.info.label: Note:
card.deep.info.text: Dev caches (npm, pip...) will re-download on next build. Normal.
card.sysopt.title: System Repair & Optimization
card.sysopt.s1.label: 7 Windows repair steps:
card.sysopt.s1.items:
SFC /scannow - checks Windows file integrity
DISM /RestoreHealth - repairs Windows image
DISM StartComponentCleanup - frees WinSxS space
Network reset (Winsock, IP) + Cloudflare DNS 1.1.1.1
Rebuild font cache
TRIM and defragmentation of all drives
card.sysopt.dur.label: Duration:
card.sysopt.dur.text: SFC and DISM can take 30-90 min. PC stays usable.
card.thirdparty.title: Third-Party App Caches
card.thirdparty.intro: Removes only caches and logs (not the apps themselves):
card.thirdparty.items:
Discord (GPU cache, code cache)
Spotify (storage cache)
Teams and Slack (cache)
OBS Studio (logs only)
Steam logs/dumps - Epic logs - Battle.net cache
card.bloat.title: BLOATWARE REMOVAL
card.bloat.body: Permanently removes: Candy Crush, Facebook, TikTok, Xbox GameBar, Cortana, Netflix, Solitaire, Mixed Reality, Bing + disables Microsoft telemetry.
card.bloat.warning: Xbox GameBar (Win+G) will be removed. Games themselves are not affected.
